title: Steel saga
creator_credit: Broken Hill Proprietary Company and Neville Bletcher
brief_description: Studies the growth and development of Port Kembla to 1960. Shows all phases of the production of steel and looks at the lives and activities of the workers who produce the steel. Narrated by David Low, Brian Henderson, Wynne Nelson.
